greetings: Hey guys! Time to stretch a bit!
Are you insane? That back must be killing you!
Hey! Before you commit that feature.
The last time was amazing, right? So, let's do it again!
facts: The part of the brain that processes movement is the same part of the brain that processes learning.
Exercise works similar to medication in treating anxiety and depression, but with less side effects.
Stress damages cognition and motor skills.
Chronic stress decreases the immune system and brain functions over time.
Vision is by far our most dominant sense, taking up one-half of our brain's resources.

It is time for a break!
The second time always is better!
Do you want more? Let's do it!

quotes.quote: Perfection is not attainable but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Don’t watch the clock, do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Go as far as you can see. When you get there, you’ll be able to see further.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Your talent determines what you can do. Your motivation determines how much you’re willing to do. Your attitude determines how well you do it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: The individual who says it is not possible should move out of the way of those doing it.
quotes.author: Tricia Cunningham

quotes.quote: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
quotes.author: Karen Lamb

quotes.quote: Everywhere is here and every when is now.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Someday is not a day of the week.
quotes.author: Janet Dailey

quotes.quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

reminders: Today is not any other day!
